metadata.description: Agent Context Protocol (ACP) skills for any kind of tasks, managed by Claude herself, added as she works

plugins.name: github-issues
plugins.description: GitHub issue management utilities: move sub-issues between parent issues, add labels in bulk. Scripts: move_subissues.py - Move all sub-issues from one parent to another with optional labels (uv run move_subissues.py <source_url> <target_url> [--label LABEL]...)
